channel.title: Stupid Shops!
channel.description:
Ever time i try to add a shop this happen's
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 15000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29)[/code]
and idk how to fix

item.title: Stupid Shops!
item.dc:creator: @Tyler_Moises Tyler Moises
item.description:
@Tyler_Moises wrote:

Yeah, There is probly an extra line. That usally get’s some of the best coder’s out there.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Shops!
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

You probaly put an extra line where you should havn’t.
Just check it over of what you did.

Or… you have max shops… if you do, just go into your shop.java file and change where it says maxshops to what ever you wish.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Shops!
item.dc:creator: @pwnage2u pwnage2u
item.description:
